original_title: 刑期を終えた強姦魔が10年ぶりに女を犯した日。 二宮ひかり
overview: He was imprisoned for 10 years on charges of strong violence and obscenity. And today, he was released from prison after completing his sentence. It's been a long time...how long have I waited for this day...I want a woman...a woman...a woman...Where is a woman who wants to be raped by me...I only have a woman. Rape is my way of life.
title: After His Sentence was done, This Devilish Guy Fucked A Woman For The First Time In 10 Years. Hikari Ninomiya
